    • authenticate

      public String authenticate(int usernameID, String password)
      method to authenticate the log in credentials of the users whether its an admin or a patron
      Parameters:
      usernameID - the id of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      is a text of the type of user if the credentials are correct or an invalid text if it's incorrect
